STAY_STILL.name: Stay Still
STAY_STILL.description: A protest where participants remain in one place.

MARCH.name: March
MARCH.description: A protest where participants walk from one location to another.

ROAD_BLOCK.name: Road Block
ROAD_BLOCK.description: A protest where participants block a road or intersection.

OTHER.name: Other
OTHER.description: A protest that does not fit into the other categories.
